metadata.feature_description: Display comprehensive user activity metrics including rank, reputation, experience, engagement, influence, and contribution statistics

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View activity details for regular user with activities

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Manage > Users panel
steps.expected: Users list is displayed with user rows and action icons
steps.actual: Users panel loaded successfully showing list of authorized users with action icons including User Activity

steps.action: Click on User Activity icon for Regular TestUser
steps.expected: Activity details panel expands showing user metrics
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing Last Active (3 hours ago), Rank (6), Reputation (6), Experience (6), Engagement (0), Influence (0), Total Contributions (0), and Recent Activity (Joined Site 3 hours ago)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View activity details for user with minimal activities

steps.action: Click on User Activity icon for Test User10
steps.expected: Activity details panel expands showing user metrics
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing Last Active (1 week ago), Rank (2), Reputation (500), Experience (500), Engagement (0), Influence (0), Total Contributions (0), and Recent Activity (Joined Site 1 week ago)

steps.action: Review displayed metrics in activity panel
steps.expected: All metrics (Rank, Reputation, Experience, Engagement, Influence, Total Contributions, Last Active, Recent Activity) should be visible and correctly formatted
steps.actual: All metrics displayed correctly: Last Active shows relative time format (e.g., '3 hours ago', '1 week ago'), Rank/Reputation/Experience show numeric values, Engagement and Influence show percentage with progress bars, Total Contributions shows count, Recent Activity shows activity description with relative timestamp

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify last active date formatting (relative time)

steps.action: Check Last Active field format for multiple users
steps.expected: Last Active should display in relative time format (e.g., '3 hours ago', '1 week ago')
steps.actual: Last Active correctly displays relative time: Regular TestUser shows '3 hours ago', Test User10 shows '1 week ago'

steps.expected: Engagement should display as a percentage (0-100) with visual progress bar
steps.actual: Engagement displays numeric value (0) with horizontal progress bar visualization. The UI correctly shows engagement as a percentage value.

steps.expected: Influence should display as a percentage with visual progress bar
steps.actual: Influence displays numeric value (0) with horizontal progress bar visualization. The UI correctly shows influence as a percentage value.

steps.expected: Total Contributions should display as a numeric count
steps.actual: Total Contributions displays correctly with bold count (0) followed by 'TOTAL CONTRIBUTIONS' label

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify SuperUser activities cannot be viewed

steps.actual: SuperUser 'host' account is displayed in the list

steps.action: Check available action icons for SuperUser account
steps.expected: User Activity icon should NOT be available for SuperUsers
steps.actual: User Activity icon is NOT displayed for the SuperUser account. Only Profile Settings and Account Settings icons are shown. This correctly prevents viewing SuperUser activity details.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Social SKU-specific features display for DNNSOCIAL

steps.action: Verify Social SKU features (Rank, Engagement, Influence) are displayed
steps.expected: Rank, Engagement, and Influence metrics should be visible since site is Evoq Engage (DNNSOCIAL SKU)
steps.actual: All Social SKU-specific features are displayed: Rank, Reputation, Experience fields are shown with Edit Points link; Engagement and Influence progress bars are visible. This confirms the site is running DNNSOCIAL SKU.

steps.action: Click Edit Points link in activity panel
steps.expected: Edit Points form should appear with editable Reputation and Experience fields
steps.actual: Edit Points form appeared with editable Reputation (500) and Experience (500) text fields, Notes text area, and Cancel/Save buttons. Rank remains read-only.

observations: Social SKU features (Rank, Reputation, Experience, Engagement, Influence, Edit Points) are only displayed for DNNSOCIAL SKU - this site is running Evoq Engage which includes these features
SuperUser accounts do not have the User Activity icon available, effectively preventing viewing of SuperUser activity details at the UI level
React error occurred when searching users with special search terms, causing panel to become blank - recovered by page refresh
Last Active uses relative time formatting via Utilities.RelativeDateFromUtcDate() function as seen in code review
Recent Activity section shows activity descriptions with relative timestamps and source (e.g., 'Evoq Content Library')
